resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this entity, including all of its children and recorded data? You will not be able to undo this operation!
This data point can go into several states of "alert" when a new value is recorded. You can receive notifications of this alert state by creating a subscription to this point.

When a data point records a new value goes to long without doing so, the point can go into an "alert state" based on these settings. You can be notified in many ways by creating subscriptions to this point.
Idle Alert - the number of seconds without receiving a new value before going into alert state
Delta Alert - triggered when a value changes by an amount based on a value in its history
Seconds of history to look back to
